title: Weekly quiz: Why was KPop Demon Hunters banned by a school?
text:
Weekly quiz: Why was KPop Demon Hunters banned by a school?

This week, Donald Trump ordered the release of the Epstein files, heavy rain and cold weather gripped the UK, and the BBC's annual Children In Need appeal raised more than Â£45m for charity.

But how much attention did you pay to what else happened in the world over the past seven days?

Quiz collated by Ben Fell.
summary: How much attention did you pay to what happened in the world over the past seven days?
